Question
========
What can cause the violation of the assumption of 'Homogeneity of
regression slopes'?

Answerlist
----------
* Participants were not randomly assigned to the experimental groups
* The effect of the covariate differs significantly between the different
  experimental groups
* The residuals are not normally distributed
* The variance of the covariate varies between the experimental groups

Solution
========


Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
